entry.title: Vagrant - Make Virtualization easier
entry.content:
Vagrant is a tool for building and distributing virtualized development environments. It uses Virtual Box in the backend.There are a variety of base boxes made of different flavours of linux os. Vagrant usage is pretty is simple. We just need to add the base box. Then create a simple Vagrantfile file. This file contains all the config for the virtual machines.

http://www.vagrantbox.es/ will give a list of available base boxes for vagrant.
